Properties.ProtectedString:
local Tool = script.Parent;
local stillEquipped = true function onEquippedLocal(mouse) stillEquipped = true if mouse == nil then print("Mouse not found") return end
while stillEquipped do print("Setting Mouse to Go") mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunCursor.png"
while Tool.Enabled and stillEquipped do wait(.01) end
print("Setting Mouse To Wait") mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunWaitCursor.png"
while not Tool.Enabled and stillEquipped do wait(.01) end end end
function onUnequippedLocal() stillEquipped = false end
Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquippedLocal) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequippedLocal)

ball = script.Parent damage = 5
HitSound = Instance.new("Sound") HitSound.Name = "HitSound" HitSound.SoundId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=11945266" HitSound.Parent = ball HitSound.Volume = 1
function onTouched(hit) if hit == nil or hit.Parent == nil then return end local humanoid = hit.Parent:findFirstChild("Humanoid")
if humanoid ~= nil then HitSound:Play() humanoid:TakeDamage(damage) end if connection then connection:disconnect() end ball.Velocity = Vector3.new(0, 0, 0) -- have the kunai drop dead upon impact ballFloat = ball:FindFirstChild("BodyForce") if ballFloat ~= nil then ballFloat:remove() end end
connection = ball.Touched:connect(onTouched)
wait(4) ball.Parent = nil

local Tool = script.Parent;
local vChar = Tool.Parent local torso = nil local RightShoulder = nil local RightArm = nil while vChar == nil or vChar.Name == "BackPack" or torso == nil or RightShoulder == nil or RightArm == nil do vChar = Tool.Parent if vChar ~= nil and vChar.Name ~= "BackPack" then torso = vChar:FindFirstChild("Torso") if torso ~= nil then RightShoulder = torso:FindFirstChild("Right Shoulder") RightArm = vChar:FindFirstChild("Right Arm") end end wait(1) end
--local r = game:service("RunService")
Tool.Enabled = true function fire(dPos)
local vCharacter = Tool.Parent if vCharacter == nil then return end local vHum = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if vHum == nil then return end local vPlayer = game.Players:playerFromCharacter(vCharacter) if vPlayer == nil then return end
local spawnPos = vCharacter.PrimaryPart.Position
spawnPos = spawnPos + dPos*5
--missile.Position = spawnPos --missile.CFrame = CFrame.new(spawnPos) --missile.Position = spawnPos
local missile = Tool.Handle:Clone() missile.Transparency = 0
--missile.Position = spawnPos -- breaks the weld missile.CFrame = CFrame.new(spawnPos, spawnPos + dPos) * CFrame.Angles(0, 0, math.pi/2)
missile.Velocity = dPos * 50 missile.RotVelocity = Vector3.new(0, 0, 0) missile.Name = "ThrownKunai" missile.CanCollide = true
local force = Instance.new("BodyForce") force.force = Vector3.new(0, missile:getMass()*196.1,0) force.Parent = missile
local creator_tag = Instance.new("ObjectValue") creator_tag.Value = vPlayer creator_tag.Name = "creator" creator_tag.Parent = missile
local new_script = script.Parent.LaserBlast:clone() new_script.Disabled = false new_script.Parent = missile
missile.Parent = game.Workspace end
function onActivated() if not Tool.Enabled then return end
Tool.Enabled = false Tool.Handle.Transparency = 1
local character = Tool.Parent; local humanoid = character.Humanoid if humanoid == nil then print("Humanoid not found") Tool.Enabled = true return end local reload = 3.25 local numNeedles = 8 local targetPos = humanoid.TargetPoint local lookAt = (targetPos - character.PrimaryPart.Position).unit
confettiBang = Tool.Handle:FindFirstChild("ThrowSound") if confettiBang ~= nil then confettiBang.Volume = .6 confettiBang:Play() end
for i = 1, numNeedles do xNoise = (math.random()-.5)*.1 yNoise = (math.random()-.5)*.1 zNoise = (math.random()-.5)*.1 fire(CFrame.Angles(xNoise, yNoise, zNoise) * lookAt)
RightShoulder.MaxVelocity = 0.5 RightShoulder.DesiredAngle = 1.9 -- 3.14 wait(.1) end
wait(reload)
confettiBang = Tool.Handle:FindFirstChild("ThrowSound") if confettiBang ~= nil then confettiBang.Volume = 0 end
Tool.Handle.Transparency = 0 Tool.Enabled = true end
function onEquipped() vChar = Tool.Parent torso = nil RightShoulder = nil RightArm = nil while vChar == nil or vChar.Name == "BackPack" or torso == nil or RightShoulder == nil or RightArm == nil do vChar = Tool.Parent if vChar ~= nil and vChar.Name ~= "BackPack" then torso = vChar:FindFirstChild("Torso") if torso ~= nil then RightShoulder = torso:FindFirstChild("Right Shoulder") RightArm = vChar:FindFirstChild("Right Arm") end end wait(1) end
end
function onUnequipped() Tool.Handle.Transparency = 0 end
script.Parent.Activated:connect(onActivated) script.Parent.Equipped:connect(onEquipped) script.Parent.Unequipped:connect(onUnequipped)
